name: food-standards-agency-file-plan
title: Food Standards Agency File Plan
description: This dataset shows the top two levels of the file plan which is used to structure records stored in Wisdom, the FSA Electronic Document Management System. The file plan is a two level list of the functions carried out by the FSA so that information can be filed, stored, managed and accessed in a logical and consistent way.
